<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Buckler Dance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6162) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=701" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 167 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Requirements**
You are wielding a [buckler](/Shields.aspx?ID=17).

</column>

---

You spin your buckler defensively toward every attack. You constantly have your buckler raised as if you'd used [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=2316), as long as you meet that action's requirements.
name: Buckler Dance
